relating to a set of actions that is the official, legal, or accepted way of doing something: The procedural changes were meant to simplify the system, which had become too bureaucratic. procedural errors/matters
media, literature
  specialized (of a television programme, film, or story) including a lot of detail about official legal or police methods and processes: Jurors often have false expectations about crime scenes and DNA evidence due to the popularity of TV procedural shows. There are four procedural dramas in the top 10 this year. Related word
